comment.body:
> Did you mean `AdGuard Tracking Protection` filter or stealth mode options? If it's a stealth mode, it might be related to `Protect against DPI`.

It might be the Protect against DPI, as the 7TV emotes and site works with the tracker filter enabled, but I have the DPI option turned off.

@@||cdn.7tv.app^$stealth=dpi

comment.body:
> Could you check the site with that option enabled? If you get the error, please test a rule below - you should add it to user rules.
> 
> @@||cdn.7tv.app^$stealth=dpi

Turning it back on caused it to be blocked again, but adding the rule you suggested fixed the issue!  I think the DPI option is filtering that site for some reason.

issue.title: Infinite loading on Cloudflare captcha page
issue.body:
### Please answer the following questions for yourself before submitting an issue

- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue
- [x] I checked the [knowledge base](https://adguard.com/kb/) and found no answer
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed

### AdGuard version

4.9.13

### Environment

- OS version: 15
- Device: galaxy s25 ultra


### HTTPS filtering

- [ x] yes, I do

### Root access

- [ ] yes, I have it

### Integration with AdGuard VPN

- [ ] yes, I do

### Routing mode

Local VPN

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances

### Security

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### Other

AdGuard DNS filter

### Which DNS server do you use?

Custom DNS

### DNS protocol

DNS-over-QUIC

### Custom DNS

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Block trackers, Remove tracking parameters from URLs, Hide your search queries, Ask websits not to track you, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Block ETag and If-None-Match headers, Block the third-party Authorization header, Disable WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Hide your Referrer from third-parties, Protect against DPI, Remove X-client-Data header from HTTP request

### Issue Details

Steps to reproduce:
1. go to https://fc-lc.xyz/hrQYa8q
2. page doesn't load


### Expected Behavior

page loads

### Actual Behavior

page hangs


### Additional Information

Added by @Versty 

The loading of webpage is broken by `[gamezizo.com](http://gamezizo.com/),[oii.io](http://oii.io/),[tmail.io](http://tmail.io/),fc-lc.xyz#%#//scriptlet('prevent-eval-if', 'ppuQnty')` rule from AdGuard Base filter. 

This problem is reproduced with AdGuard for Mac + AdGuard VPN for Mac running.

commits.message: Fix #199402 Infinite loading on Cloudflare captcha page

issue.body:

comment.body:
Hello. I've checked Reddit and YouTube with the AdGuard extension for Safari, and I've found that I can't reproduce the adverts. Could you please check that all content blockers are enabled in Safari settings, and that you've also allowed for private browsing? If everything is enabled, I'd be grateful if you could try turning them on and off, disabling third-party filters in the extension, reloading Safari and reopening the page.
If you need any further assistance setting up the application, our technical support team is here to help. Just send an email to `support@adguard.com`

comment.body:
Hi,
I think the issue might be down to a filter rule in uBlock Origin – Badware Risk:
```
||onelink.me/*&af_web_dp=$document
```
If you could add this rule to the user rules to temporarily unblock it for you, that'd be great!
```
||onelink.me/*&af_web_dp=$document,badfilter
```

@mapx- Would you mind taking a look?

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

On my mobile I do not get any detection at all and on desktop only without that rule.

Please try to add this rule:
`@@||ecosolardigest.com^$generichide`

https://quesignifi.ca/adpartner.min.js

```

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.

Если можете - запишите файл HAR, посмотрю, может что-то не блокируется.

issue.title: filmstreaming-de.life: phishing sites

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

latest

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Dangerous site

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

filmstreaming-de.life

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Phishing website filmstreaming-de.life.

Clicking on any of fake buttons in movie page brings up fake player with Universal intro (played for every movie) with more fake buttons below.

Clicking them opens site bigleague-connexion.com (at the time of writing this report) which asks for personal data, most of the time only email address. By entering fake gibberish email address, I got to site which asks for payment card details. Site's name changes very often. I got ganturbio.xyz, tazarrasto.xyz, register.speedy-leopard.co. There might be more domains. And keep in mind that domain bigleague-connexion.com might change as well.

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

### Add your comment and screenshots

Phishing website filmstreaming-de.life.

Clicking on any of fake buttons in movie page brings up fake player with Universal intro (played for every movie) with more fake buttons below.

Clicking them opens site bigleague-connexion.com (at the time of writing this report) which asks for personal data, most of the time only email address. By entering fake gibberish email address, I got to site which asks for payment card details. Site's name changes very often. I got ganturbio.xyz, tazarrasto.xyz, register.speedy-leopard.co. There might be more domains. And keep in mind that domain bigleague-connexion.com might change as well.

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: This is a very new issue, and I am sure it has not been investigated thoroughly to determine its root cause. It would be better if this issue were reported to the developers, as they will likely be able to fix it with a new update. As I mentioned, the only reason I used AdGuard was because of its flawless ad-blocking features, and I have been using it for a long time. This is the first time I’ve encountered an issue that no one seems to understand, or where AdGuard ultimately failed to do what it is supposed to do.
